name: Bug Report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

### Notes
- Please speak English, this is the language all maintainers can speak and write.
- Please ask questions problems on our Discussions Forum (https://github.com/bitstep-ie/mango-go/discussions/).
- Make sure you are using the latest release and
take a moment to check that your issue hasn't been [reported before](https://github.com/bitstep-ie/mango-go/issues?q=label%3Abug).
- Fill in the below template with the most information you can provide


# Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

# Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Import '...'
3. Execute '....'
4. See error

# Expected
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

# Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

# Versions
 - **OS**: type [e.g. ubuntu] & version [e.g. 22]
 - **mango-go**: version [e.g. v1.2.0]

# Additional
Add any other context about the problem here.
